me.david.timbernocheat.api.hook

Interface TNCHook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Citizens2Hook

    public interface TNCHook
    Hooks can be used to Fix compatibility issues with TNC
    See Also:
    Citizens2Hook

      • violation

        boolean violation(Check check,
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  double afterVio,
                  double addedVio)
        Triggers on an Violation event
        Parameters:
        check - the check that triggered the Violation
        player - the player that triggered the violation
        afterVio - the violation that the player has after the violation
        addedVio - the amount of violation that has been added to the violation level
        Returns:
        should we cancel the violation

      • punishment

        boolean punishment(Check check,
                   org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   Violation.ViolationTypes type)
        Triggers on an Player Punishment
        Parameters:
        check - the Check that caused that Punishment
        player - the Player that caused the Punishment
        type - the type of the punishment
        Returns:
        should we cancel the punishment
